name: WordElations
description:
Welcome to WordElations, a Word Constellation Game.

Form Words with the given letters, make your own Constellations and capture them...

Try the Daily Challenge that gives you the same level for 24 hours, or play a Random Game to sharpen your skills and create amazing Constellation Maps at the end...

How To Play:

Pick connected letters and form words.

At any time you can cancel the selection using

When a correct word is formed the selection lights up and you get a definition of that word at the lower part of the screen and you can accept the word using

Scoring is calculated by adding the points of the chosen letters and multiplying them to the number of letters.

At the start of each word you can drag any of the available tokens on a letter to change it to something that suits your word. The new letter will have zero (0) points, however it will count towards the number of chosen letters.

Form any word with 5 or more letters and you will get an extra Blank Token.
